ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // {Barret}
“…I know I was stupid.
I'm not asking you to forgive me.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Barret}
“But…what're you doin' in a
place like this?”{PAUSE}“Why ya wanna kill people who
ain't even involved? Why?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // {Barret}
“Dyne, Marlene…
Marlene's still alive.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // {Barret}
“I went back into town.
I thought she was gone for sure.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // {Barret}
“I wandered around town
for awhile…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // {Barret}
“That's when I found her…
…found Marlene.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // {Barret}
“She's in Midgar.
Let's go see her together, all right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:36}); // {Barret}
“Stop, Dyne!
I can't die yet!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:38}); // {Barret}
“Stop it!
I don't wanna fight you!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:45}); // {Barret}
“Dyne…I don't know either, man.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:46}); // {Barret}
“Is this the only way…
we can resolve this?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:49}); // {Barret}
“An' what 'bout Marlene?
What's gonna happen to her!?”

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Dyne
“I can hear her voice. What's that?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // Dyne
“It's Eleanor's voice.
Begging me…
not to hate your rotten guts.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // Dyne
“That's why I never
hunted you down…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // Dyne
“Why!?
The hell do you care!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // Dyne
“You think the dead understand why's?
Is hearin' Shinra's excuses gonna make
people in Corel understand anything?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // Dyne
“I don't CARE about reasons!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // Dyne
“All they give us is artillery and stupid excuses…
What's left is a world of despair and emptiness…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // Dyne
“You still want to hear 'why'?
…All right, I'll tell you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:47}); // Dyne

I…
I wanna destroy everything…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:48}); // Dyne

This crazy world…

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:50}); // Dyne

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:51}); // Dyne

she wouldn't even know me…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // Dyne

to carry her anymore…”

dialogStrings:
Dyne
“Now that's a voice I haven't heard in years…”

{Barret}
“I always hoped I'd be able
to see you again someday…”{PAUSE}“I knew you were alive somewhere…
we had the same operation.”

Dyne
“I can hear her voice. What's that?”

Dyne
“It's Eleanor's voice.
Begging me…
not to hate your rotten guts.”

Dyne
“That's why I never
hunted you down…”

{Barret}
“…I know I was stupid.
I'm not asking you to forgive me.”

{Barret}
“But…what're you doin' in a
place like this?”{PAUSE}“Why ya wanna kill people who
ain't even involved? Why?”

Dyne
“Why!?
The hell do you care!?”

Dyne
“You think the dead understand why's?
Is hearin' Shinra's excuses gonna make
people in Corel understand anything?”

Dyne
“All they give us is artillery and stupid excuses…
What's left is a world of despair and emptiness…”

Dyne
“You still want to hear 'why'?
…All right, I'll tell you.”

Dyne
“'Cause I want to destroy everything.”

Dyne
“I got nothing left in this world.
Corel, Eleanor…
Marlene…”

{Barret}
“I went back into town.
I thought she was gone for sure.”

{Barret}
“She's in Midgar.
Let's go see her together, all right?”

Dyne
“All right, {Barret}.
Then I guess you and me gotta fight.”

Dyne
“Eleanor's all by herself.
I gotta take Marlene to her.”

Dyne
“Marlene wants to see her mom,
don't she?”

Dyne
“Oh yeah?
Well my life's been
over ever since then.”

{Barret}
“Stop it!
I don't wanna fight you!”

{Barret}
“{Cloud}, you stay the hell out of it!
This is MY problem!!”

Dyne
“…I didn't just lose an arm
back then…”{PAUSE}“I lost something irreplaceable.
I don't know where it went wrong…”

{Barret}
“Is this the only way…
we can resolve this?”

Dyne
“I told you…
I…
I wanna destroy everything…”

Dyne
“Everything…
This crazy world…
Even me…”

{Barret}
“An' what 'bout Marlene?
What's gonna happen to her!?”

Dyne
“…Think about it…{Barret}…
How old was Marlene back then?”

Dyne
“Even if I did go see her…
she wouldn't even know me…”

Dyne
“My hands are too stained
to carry her anymore…”

Dyne
“Give that pendant to Marlene…
It was…Eleanor's…
my wife's…a memento…”

{Barret}
“…Dyne.
Me an' you were the same…”

{Barret}
“My hands ain't any cleaner…
I shouldn't carry Marlene either…”
